projects.name: Maze Solver
achievements: Developed a Python-based Maze Solver, implementing efficient pathfinding algorithms like BFS and DFS to navigate complex mazes
Designed and implemented an interactive GUI using Tkinter, enhancing visualization and user interaction for maze generation and solving
Applied object-oriented programming principles, ensuring modular, maintainable, and scalable code architecture

projects.name: Asteroids Video Game
achievements: Developed a 2D space shooter game in Python using Pygame, implementing real-time physics, collision detection, and responsive controls.
Designed an object-oriented architecture with class inheritance to manage game logic, entities, and interactions efficiently.

projects.name: AutoDoc
achievements: Engineered an AI-powered Python documentation generator using DeepSeek via Ollama with a FastAPI backend, enabling async code parsing and efficient model integration
Built an interactive React/TailwindCSS viewer with PDF export functionality, allowing users to browse and download generated documentation with ease

projects.name: Static Site Generator
achievements: Built a custom static site generator in Python to convert Markdown to HTML with advanced formatting and templating support.
Designed a modular architecture with 90%+ test coverage and automated the build process for streamlined website generation.

projects.name: GPU Architecture Performance Analysis
achievements: Developed Python scripts to monitor GPU performance across NVIDIA architectures, tracking TFLOPS, bandwidth, and optimization metrics
Benchmarked CUDA kernels on RTX 3000/4000 series GPUs using Nsight Compute, analyzing architectural performance impacts
Utilized Nsight Graphics for comprehensive analysis of API calls and shader execution patterns across gaming engines

projects.name: Real-time Weather Analytics Platform
achievements: Created a serverless AWS Lambda pipeline for real-time weather analysis across 14 regions
Optimized S3 storage and CSV processing, cutting data retrieval time by 30%
Built an interactive weather dashboard with alerts for climate zone monitoring

projects.name: Ocular Eye Disease Detection
achievements: Developed an ML model with TensorFlow to detect 8 ocular diseases from 5000+ retinal images
Achieved 86% accuracy using EfficientNetB0 and transfer learning
Improved feature extraction with K-means clustering and PCA

projects.name: Shadow-interiors Website
achievements: Desinged and Developed Shadow-interiors, a website for an interior design company, using React and Firebase
Crafted a clean and modern design that increased the online presence and brand awareness of the company
Deployed the website to Firebase Hosting, enhancing the performance, security, and scalability of the website
